EmailTemplate.name: CR 2.3.1 Notification of Submitted Application (returners)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for applying to work on the NCS programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting an application to work on the NCS programme again this autumn.
We aim to review applications within 3 weeks of receiving them. If you do not hear back from us within this period, please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org quoting the email reference below in any correspondence.
Again, thank you for taking the time to complete another application, and for your continued interest in The Challenge and the NCS programme.
Best wishes, The Challenge
NCS Programme
seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Email Reference: CR 2.3.1
